about_the_game:
Under the shimmering stars and the radiant moonlight, enter the mystical realm of the Japanese garden and unleash your fighting skills in this enchanting Dojo.

Also included is an awesome new soundtrack that will keep you hyped up and ready to fight your way through the levels feeling like a true warrior.
detailed_description:
Under the shimmering stars and the radiant moonlight, enter the mystical realm of the Japanese garden and unleash your fighting skills in this enchanting Dojo.

Also included is an awesome new soundtrack that will keep you hyped up and ready to fight your way through the levels feeling like a true warrior.
name: Crazy Kung Fu - Garden Dojo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD FX 8350
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Under the shimmering stars and the radiant moonlight, enter the mystical realm of the Japanese garden and unleash your fighting skills in this enchanting Dojo.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish
